Tavatron looked back toward the ark. She slowly opened the doors and walked 
inside. She had been searching for something that was not there, or 
extremely well hidden.

Tavatron sighed, a pity really. He was such a great warrior, he could be so 
much more. Maybe some day he would realize this, and perhaps she would be 
the one to help him realize it.

"I look forward to it."
